title: 'Twin Peaks,' 'Alien Covenant,' and the Highs and Lows of IP (Ep. 152)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald celebrate the return of 'Twin Peaks' by giving it "The Belt" and discussing the arc of the first couple episodes (2:30). Later, writer Adam Nayman joins to discuss director Ridley Scott and his latest film, 'Alien Covenant' (27:24).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
